messages.author: ajuma
messages.text: Consider moving the "if (min > max)" check (currently done after conversion to radians) to here, so that min_degrees and max_degrees really do mean min and max.

messages.author: Ian Vollick
messages.text:
On 2013/10/11 13:18:17, ajuma wrote:
> Consider moving the "if (min > max)" check (currently done after conversion to
> radians) to here, so that min_degrees and max_degrees really do mean min and
> max.

Done.

messages.author: ajuma
messages.text: Also include cases where min_progress < 0 and max_progress > 1.

messages.author: Ian Vollick
messages.text:
On 2013/10/11 13:18:17, ajuma wrote:
> Also include cases where min_progress < 0 and max_progress > 1.

Done.
